Where you want, when you want. Auckland Sea Shuttles' water taxis run to a regular schedule, or you can book a time that suits you!

  • Scheduled Water Taxi Departures

    Regular departures from Auckland to the islands every day of the week. We have no minimum number requirements but we cannot guarantee we won't book out!

    Timetable & booking

  • Water Taxi Charter Options

    Where you want, when you want — gets you to any of our destinations in the Hauraki Gulf on your own time. Flexible and affordable.

    More info & booking

  • Hauraki Beach Day Drop Offs

    Takes you away from the busy city life in Auckland and to a piece of paradise of your choosing! Auckland is only minutes away from beautiful islands and secluded beaches.

    More info & booking

  • Auckland Night Starter Cruise

    Looking for a different way to start your night out in Auckland? Head down to the harbour and let us take you out for an hour to show you the bright lights from a different direction. BYO optional.

    More info & booking

  • Auckland Fishing Charters and Diving Trips

    Hire the boat for a half or full day with a few friends on the water. Steve is an experienced dive instructor with over 10 years' experience.

    More info & booking

  • Coastguard Education and Boating Courses

    We can teach you to be safe at sea via the Coastguard and Royal Yacht Association boating courses. It's probably the most fun qualification you can achieve!

    More info & booking
